bibl.title: Cleopatra. Histories, Dreams and Distortions.
bibl.note: "Cleopatra's legend has undergone many metamorphoses in the two millennia since her death. The book is about all of these dream-Cleopatras. It is not primarily her biography."
bibl.seg: HUGHES-HALLETT Lucy, Cleopatra. Histories, Dreams and Distortions.
London, Bloomsbury, 1990, 8Â°, [xii]-339 pp. et 50 figg. ISBN 0-7475-0093-2.
"Cleopatra's legend has undergone many metamorphoses in the two millennia since her death. The book is about all of these dream-Cleopatras. It is not primarily her biography."
C.R. par Robert Steven Bianchi, JARCE 28 (1991) pp. 239-240.
